packages.title: Low Earth Orbit
packages.description: Experience zero gravity, enjoy the breath-taking views, & relax in space for 3 Days.

packages.title: Lunar Exploration
packages.description: Take your next vacation to the moon, experience how Neil Armstrong felt when he took the giant leap for mankind.

packages.title: Mars Adventure
packages.description: Our premium experience, a once in a lifetime chance to visit humanity's next home.

packages.title: Moon Orbit
packages.description: Orbit the moon for 3 days, while enjoying spectacular food and a view of the cradle of humanity.

packages.title: Mars Orbit
packages.description: Enjoy striking views of the red planet as you dine with our 5 star chef Jignesh.

Orbit.title: Spacewalk
Orbit.description: Take an anti-gravity stroll, while tethered to the ship. Perform mock maintainence tasks around the ship, much like real astronauts.

Orbit.title: Obstacle Course
Orbit.description: An anti-gravity obstacle course in space with challenges that will test your agility, endurance, and problem-solving skills.

Moon.title: ATV Ride
Moon.description: Explore the tough terrains and craters of the moon on your own ATV's

Moon.title: Lunarball
Moon.description: Play basketball in low gravity, jumping tall and high, dunking hard and gloriously

Moon.title: Apollo Mission Site Tour
Moon.description: Get your own personal tour guide to visit the famous bootprint and U.S. flag, and eat some specialty space food

Moon.title: Stargazing
Moon.description: Climb Mons Pico, and watch the skies with a glass of champagne (ID needed)

Mars.title: ATV Ride
Mars.description: Explore the tough terrains and craters of mars on your own ATV's

Mars.title: Mars Hike
Mars.description: Explore the Martian terrain and landscapes on a rover or by foot, visit and study geological features such as canyons, mountains, and valleys.

Mars.title: Dust Surfing
Mars.description: Take an exhilarating ride over the powerful winds and currents of Martian dust.

Mars.title: Cave Exploration
Mars.description: Experience a thrilling adventure that reveals the secrets of what lies under the surface of the Red Planet.
